ABOUT ME

My name is Sukanya Saysud. I have graduated from King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi with Bachelor of Science in Applied Computer Science - Multimedia. I am a graphic designer, illustrator and author. I have been working on small projects as a designer and a content creator.
My passion is to design that everyone can use. I would like to make sure that our concept will come to life.
